txt.en:
'Hungry then?'

Rook glances down, his face betraying deep disappointment.

'This avanc has a very particular taste for meat, you see. It will only eat the finest of meats from the strongest of the beasts in Rohan. 

'Fortunate for him, strong beasts lurk all around us here. Fetch me some meat, and I will see you rewarded.'
'For all the trouble that was, he had better enjoy this.\n\n'Here is your reward... as promised.'
Rook is convinced that his avanc is merely hungry. However, he knows that the avanc will only eat the very best of meats and wishes you to confront the most dangerous creatures in the Sutcrofts.
Collect meat from the most dangerous beasts in the Sutcrofts ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Rook wants you to hunt the most dangerous beasts in the Sutcrofts. He mentioned that they are nearby, but will not say more.
Rook can be found to the west of Snowbourn.
